sql-script.name: script
sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_log_entity_update ( id char(32) not null, beanid char(32) not null, opid int4 not null, valname varchar(32) not null, fromval varchar(128), toval varchar(128), userid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, ip varchar(32) not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );

create table sf_log_entity_delete ( id char(32) not null, beanid char(32), tblname varchar(32) not null, userid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, ip varchar(32) not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );

create table sf_log_download ( id char(32) not null, beanid char(32) not null, filesize int8 not null, filetype varchar(16), userid char(32), createdate timestamp not null, ip varchar(32) not null, lastupdate timestamp, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );
create table sf_log_login ( id char(32) not null, userid char(32), createdate timestamp not null, logoutdate timestamp, ip varchar(32) not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );

create table sf_log_pv_stat ( id char(32) not null, lyear int4 not null, lmonth int2 not null, lday int2 not null, lhour int2 not null, pv int4 not null, uv int4 not null, ip int4 not null, primary key(id) );
